index.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Syncfusion React Sample</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no" />
    <meta http-equiv="x-ua-compatible" content="ie=edge">
    <meta name="description" content="Syncfusion React UI Components" />
    <meta name="author" content="Syncfusion" />
    <link href="https://cdn.syncfusion.com/ej2/28.1.33/{{theme}}.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.7/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" />
</head>

<body class="{{theme}}">
     <style>
            .control-section
            {
                margin-top: 100px;
            }
    </style>
    <div id='sample'>
</body>
</html>
index.js:

{ this.customTextStepper = stepper; }} created={() => { this.customTextStepper.activeStep = 2; }}> { this.iconStepper = stepper; }} created={() => { this.iconStepper.activeStep = 2; }}> { this.iconLabelStepper = stepper; }} created={() => { this.iconLabelStepper.activeStep = 2; }}> { this.labelStepper = stepper; }} created={() => { this.labelStepper.activeStep = 2; }}>
); } } const root = createRoot(document.getElementById('sample')); root.render();
